bpdu-protection.description: Enable/disable to configure BPDU protection on an edge port. This function prevents network flapping caused by attack packets.

flush-capability.description: Enable/disable to flush capability on a switch.

max-hops.description: Set the maximum hops of a spanning tree in an MST region.

mode.description: Set an operation mode for the current MSTP process.

path-cost-standard.description: Set a standard for calculating the path cost.

tc-protection.description: Enable/disable to configure the TC BPDU protection function for an MSTP process.

tc-protection-threshold.description: Set the maximum number of TC BPDUs that the MSTP can handle.

tc-protection-interval.description: Set the time the MSTP device takes to handle the maximum number of TC BPDUs and immediately refresh forwarding entries.

timer-factor.description: Set a multiplier for the Hello timer. If a device does not receive BPDUs from an upstream device within the timeout period (timeout period = hello time x 3 x timer factor), the spanning tree is calculated again.

region-name.description: Configure an MST region name for a device.

revision-level.description: Configure a revision level for an MST region.

forward-delay.description: Set the value of the forward delay. The step is 1000ms.

hello-time.description: Set the interval at which BPDUs are sent. The step is 1000ms.

max-age.description: Set the BPDU aging time on a port of a device. The step is 1000ms.

priority.description: Set the priority of a device in a spanning tree instance. The default step is 4096, that is, the device can have 16 priorities configured, such as 0, 4096, and 8192. A smaller value indicates a higher priority.

root-type.description: Configure the current device as the root bridge of a spanning tree instance.

instances.description: List of configurations of process instance.

port-pw-common.description: Common attributes of port and PW.

loop-protection.description: Enable/disable loop protection on the current port.

no-agreement-check.description: Enable/disable to configure the common fast transition mechanism on the current interface.

point-to-point.description: Set the link type of a port.

root-protection.description: Enable/disable root protection on the current port.

transmit-limit.description: Set the maximum number of BPDUs sent by the current port within each hello interval.

tc-restriction.description: Enable/disable to configure TC/TCN packet suppression.

bpdu-filter.description: Specify the current port as a BPDU filter port or a non-BPDU filter port.

edge-port.description: Specify the current port as an edge port or a non-edge port.

vpls-sub-interface.description: Enable/disable to configure an interface to instruct its VPLS-bound sub-interfaces to update ARP and MAC entries after the interface receives TC BPDUs.

bpdu-filter.description: Enable/disable to default configuration of the BPDU filter function.

edge-port.description: Enable/disable default configuration of global edge port function.

transmit-limit.description: Maximum number of BPDUs allowed to be sent globally within a hello interval.

tc-notify.description: Enable/disable the TC notification function on the current MSTP process.

link-share-protect.description: Enable/disable to configure shared-link protection for an MSTP process.

error-packet-statistic.description: Operational state of displaying error packet information, including error packet statistics, packet contents and receiving time.

time.description: Display the last time when error packets were received.

count.description: Display the statistics about error packets received by MSTP.

content.description: Display the contents of received error packets.

bpdu-filter.description: Enable/disable to default configuration of the BPDU filter function.

edge-port.description: Enable/disable default configuration of global edge port function.

transmit-limit.description: Maximum number of BPDUs allowed to be sent globally within a hello interval.

instances_schema.description: List of configurations of process instance.

tc-notify.description: Enable/disable the TC notification function on the current MSTP process.

link-share-protect.description: Enable/disable to configure shared-link protection for an MSTP process.

tc-notify.description: Enable/disable the TC notification function on the current MSTP process.

link-share-protect.description: Enable/disable to configure shared-link protection for an MSTP process.

error-packet-statistic_schema.description: Operational state of displaying error packet information, including error packet statistics, packet contents and receiving time.

time.description: Display the last time when error packets were received.

count.description: Display the statistics about error packets received by MSTP.

content.description: Display the contents of received error packets.
